predictions.text: The FOMC will cut the federal funds target range by 25 bps to 5.00%–5.25% at its December 2025 meeting.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified by the Federal Reserve Board press release and FOMC statement dated 2025-12-11 specifying the new target range as 5.00%–5.25%.
monitoring_signals: November CPI release and components (shelter, core services ex-housing)
Fed funds futures (CME FedWatch) implied probabilities
Financial conditions indices
FOMC statement language and SEP medians
predictions.rationale: Cooling labor demand and market pricing point to a moderate, pre-signaled cut.

predictions.text: By 2025-12-20 (UTC), the U.S. Commerce Department (BIS) will publicly confirm or formalize policy enabling Nvidia H200 shipments to China (e.g., guidance or Federal Register notice).
predictions.verification_criteria: A BIS press release, BIS website guidance, or a Federal Register notice explicitly confirming permissible export conditions for Nvidia H200 shipments to China without case-by-case licenses.
monitoring_signals: BIS press releases and rulemaking docket
Federal Register export control notices
White House fact sheets or statements
Nvidia investor relations updates
predictions.rationale: White House signaling implies BIS follow-through to operationalize policy.

predictions.text: CISA will add at least 5 new CVEs to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) Catalog in December 2025.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count December 2025 KEV entries on the CISA KEV Catalog page; five or more December-dated additions satisfies this.
monitoring_signals: High-profile vendor advisories noting in-the-wild exploitation
Zero-day disclosures from Microsoft, Apple, Google, Mozilla, Cisco
Threat intel reports linking active exploitation
CISA Binding Operational Directive updates
predictions.rationale: Typical December cadence and ongoing exploitation flow make 5+ KEV additions likely.

predictions.text: The iShares PHLX Semiconductor ETF (SOXX) will close at a new all-time high on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any official closing price for SOXX (Nasdaq/NYSE Arca) equal to or above its prior record close, as recorded by the exchange or iShares product page.
monitoring_signals: Nvidia and TSMC guidance and unit demand
Rates moves affecting duration-sensitive growth equities
Breadth within semiconductor subsectors (equipment vs. designers)
AI capex commentary from hyperscalers and enterprise
predictions.rationale: AI demand and policy tailwinds support semis leadership into year-end.

predictions.text: U.S. Core PCE Price Index (MoM, SA) for November 2025 will print between +0.1% and +0.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: BEA Personal Income and Outlays news release for November 2025; Table showing Core PCE (PCE excluding food & energy) month-over-month percent change within the stated range.
monitoring_signals: CPI core services ex-housing nowcasts
PPI components mapping to PCE
Healthcare and financial services price indicators
Revisions to prior months’ PCE
predictions.rationale: Disinflation trend persists, with core services sticky but moderating.

predictions.text: Seasonally adjusted U.S. Initial Jobless Claims for the week ending 2025-12-06 will print between 220,000 and 245,000.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Department of Labor Unemployment Insurance Weekly Claims News Release for the specified week; initial claims figure must fall within the range.
monitoring_signals: High-frequency claims from large states (CA, NY, TX)
Continuing claims trend
Holiday adjustment factors
Layoff announcements (Challenger report) and hiring plans (NFIB)
predictions.rationale: Labor demand is cooler but stable; seasonal noise contained.

predictions.text: ICE Brent crude front-month futures will settle at or above $88.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Settlement price for the front-month Brent futures contract as published by ICE Futures Europe on any trading day on or before 2025-12-31 must be ≥ $88.00.
monitoring_signals: OPEC+ policy and compliance headlines
Geopolitical supply risks (Middle East, Russia)
U.S. inventory and product demand data (EIA)
Dollar index and global growth indicators
predictions.rationale: Year-end geopolitics and positioning can spur an upside test in Brent.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS10) will close at or below 3.95% on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Daily close for DGS10 on FRED at or below 3.95% on any trading day through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: FOMC decision and SEP path
Inflation releases (CPI, PCE)
Treasury refunding and term premium estimates
Risk sentiment and foreign demand for USTs
predictions.rationale: A dovish Fed and disinflation increase odds of a sub-4% 10Y print.

predictions.text: NAR Total housing inventory at end of November 2025 will print between 1.05 million and 1.25 million.
predictions.verification_criteria: National Association of Realtors Existing-Home Sales news release for November 2025; the 'Total inventory' end-of-month figure must fall within the range.
monitoring_signals: Mortgage rates and applications (MBA)
Active listings data (Altos/Redfin)
Homebuilder sentiment (NAHB)
Regional MLS inventory trends
predictions.rationale: Higher rates have lifted active listings modestly into year-end.

predictions.text: ICE Endex Dutch TTF front-month natural gas will settle at or above €50.00/MWh on at least one trading day by 2025-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Front-month TTF futures settlement published by ICE Endex at ≥ €50.00/MWh on any trading day through 2025-12-31.
monitoring_signals: European weather forecasts (HDDs) and cold snaps
LNG supply disruptions and shipping constraints
Storage levels vs. 5-year average
Pipeline flows from Norway/Russia and Asian spot demand
predictions.rationale: Winter weather risks and LNG volatility can trigger a brief price spike.
